title: APPLE iPad 128 GB ROM 9.7 inch with Wi-Fi+4G (Silver)

product_specification.Processor Type: A9 Chip with 64-bit Architecture with Embedded M9 Co-processor
product_specification.Additional Features: Built-in Stereo Speakers, Digital Compass, Fingerprint Identity Sensor Built into the Home Button, Siri, Operating Ambient Temperature: 0 Degree to 35 Degree C, Non-operating Temperature: -20 Degree to 45 Degree C, Relative Humidity: 5% to 95% Non-condensing, Operating Altitude: Tested Upto 3000 Metres (10000 Feet)
product_specification.Sales Package: iPad, Lightning to USB Cable, USB Power Adapter, User Manual, Warranty Card
product_specification.Sensors: Touch ID, Three-axis Gyro, Accelerometer, Barometer, Ambient Light Sensor
product_specification.Other Camera Features: Rear Camera: Autofocus, Panorama, HDR, Exposure Control, Burst Mode, Tap to Focus, Timer Mode, f/2.4 Aperture, Five-element Lens, Hybrid IR Flter, Backside Illumination, Auto Image Stabilisation, Face Detection, Photo Geotagging, Video Image Stabilisation, Slow Motion (120 fps), 3x Video Zoom, Video Geotagging, Front Camera: F/2.2 Aperture, 720p HD Video Recording, Backside Illumination, Face Detection, Burst Mode, Exposure Control, Timer Mode
product_specification.Other Display Features: LED Backlit Display with IPS Technology, Fingerprint-resistant Oleophobic Coating
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tablet, 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.Retina Display: Whether you're browsing the internet, shopping, looking at family vacation photos, working on a presentation or watching a movie, the Apple iPad's 24.63 cm (9.7) Retina display, along with 2048x1536 resolution, brings it all to life to give you an immersive viewing experience.
product_description.Performance: Play graphics-rich games, use rich apps or do both together without facing any lag on the Apple iPad, thanks to its 64-bit A9 chip which ensures a glitch-free performance. This iPad is also powered by a massive battery which allows you to enjoy whatever you love doing for up to 10 hours.
product_description.iOS 10: For those of you who love to play as much as you love to work, the Apple iPad is for you as it lets you use two apps at once, thanks to its iOS 10. Ask Siri to send a message to your friend and automatically backup files so you can access them from anywhere.
product_description.Touch ID: Hate entering your bank details every time you choose to shop online? With the Apple iPad, you can do it with just a touch of your finger. Your fingerprint will be your password, thanks to the Touch ID which secures private data in apps for added protection.
product_description.Cameras: Capture the world around you with stunning clarity and sharpness with iPad's 8 MP camera. Record 1080p HD videos of events that you want to keep replaying and edit them directly on this iPad. With its front-facing 1.2 MP FaceTime HD camera, you can video call your friends and family from all over the world.
product_description.Continuity: Start something on this iPad and complete it on either your iPhone or Mac. You can also use AirDrop to transfer and share files between devices.
product_description.Design: The aluminium unibody construction of this iPad ensures durability and reassures a solid feel. This tablet also weighs just about 478 g and is just 7.5 mm thin.
product_description.Speedy Surfing and Streaming: Stay connected all the time, wherever you are as this iPad supports up to 150 Mbps 4G LTE and up to 866 Mbps Wifi for speedy surfing and streaming.

I'm using the iPad 9.7 2017 since 1onth now and below is my review about it:

(1) Screen - Absolutely stunning.
(2) Battery - Easily lasts for a day with normal heavy use with full brightness.
(3) Storage - I got about 28 GB out of that 32 GB mark. It is more than sufficient as I'm using it only for business presentation purpose.
(4) OS - Very good operating system.(though I'm an Android lover)
(5) Build quality - Comeon guys, any doubt about Apple devices' build quality? Solid build quality.
(6) File transfer - It is a headache specially if you are used to Android. But it is manageable. Not so bad either.

What more do you need from tablet at such low price?

It is a damm reasonable Tablet. Just go for it.

Specially for Android users:
(Frustratingly Amazing Product)
Writing this review after 1 month of usage and Android users must read before purchase.
The iPad is definitely an amazing product but is it really that amazing... I doubt!

I bought this product to read books n newspaper online and for that purpose it really does an amazing job.

Here's where iPad s*cks !

*While everyone knows the screen is not a laminated LCD but what most don't know is that screen makes a TAP .. TAP sound when u tap against it. The same sound u get when u tap on any Hollow surface. It's irritating at times.
*Fingerprint sensor is kinda slow takes a little more than 1sec to unlock.
*Battery backup is good but takes lifetime to charge!
*Camera is between ok-ok and good in outdoor lights but images are grainy in indoor lights.
*Doesn't support Whatsapp, Instagram, iwatch.. (mine is non cellular model). YouTube app doesn't have back icon, you'll have to search for the entire thing again. It's actually frustrating!

*you'll need a laptop (i tunes) to upload songs, movies, books etc. Doesn't support OTG!
You can use SHAREit but anything received via it will be shown only in SHAREit app only.

*Apps are much-much bigger in size than they do in Android. eg: WPS office 206 MB, One Note 166.7MB, MS Word 236.6MB, MS Excel 227.5 MB, Gmail 148MB, YouTube 123.6MB etc.
So If you're on limited monthly data pack then Beware! (Specially if you're starting fresh)

*Finally comes the restrictions that iOS has in it. Even after 1 month of usage I still don't know how to download a subtitle for any movie that I'm playing. (I know it's shameful but believe me iOS only frustrates u as an Android user)
Can't download songs, pdf etc.
File manager is biggest bluff in the history of any Android file manager app bcz it's no where close to any Android file manager. (Do search for more)
And this is just the tip of the Iceberg!

*doesn't support Apple pencil and other styluses with softer tips are harder to use because of non laminated display!

Pros:
The best part of this product which deserves applaud is it
*doesn't lag
*doesn't heat
*Excellent RAM management
*sound is not very loud but speakers are good
*battery backup is good
*Apps despite big size, open with ease, are crisp and smooth.
*iOS 11 is good.
*Display is good, you can filter blue light to read for longer hours. Bigger bezels are good for holding.
*Looks very premium, people will definitely notice it when you carry it around.

I ensured to buy from Flipkart Assured seller (IndiFlashMart) hence no problem in packaging or the product itself. Talking about the product-it is sturdy, not very light but not on the heavier side too. The screen quality, resolution is the best in this range, perhaps unmatched compared to other tablets of similar size in similar range. The screen is 100% fingerprint magnet but not a problem.. For those wondering about the NON LAMINATED display, yes one can spot that gap but is not at all a problem. Don't let this hinder you from buying this product.
I have been an android user and using iOS is easy, but it is worth mentioning that android gives way more freedom than iOS, but still, iOS-11 on iPad has its own beauty.. Absolutely love it.
Other Things
Speakers- are very good.
Cameras - grainy in low light.. otherwise is descent.
Gaming is descent, haven't had any lags.
The back is probably polycarbonate i guess, but not metal for sure.

One would not regret having purchased this.. Not at all..

This is my first apple device, I purchased this for Rs. 18400 in sales during durga puja in 2017 and l love it truly. It may be strange for a person like me who works only on Linux and android to like apple. When I purchase and opened iPad first time, I did not found file folder system, I got a bit disappointed. Anyway the best things I like about this device:
1. The massive battery which is 32.5 Wh and it can last for 3 to 4 days with normal 3 to 4 hr on-screen reading and 1 or 2 hours of video watching on YouTube. My bluetooth and wifi are open all the time, in spite of that I charge after 3 or 4 days.
2.The touch and screen is as smooth as butter.
3. Does not heat while charging .
4. Never saw lag in device even if 10 to 15 apps are running in background.

I purchased this device for ebook reading and this is really good in that. I never felt need of hard copy. I carry all the books with me anywhere. I can put all my codes, files and folders for meeting and discuss there without carrying heavy laptop. I don't have to bother about stability of device.
Apart from apple's inherent problem of unavailability of free apps and incompatibility with linux or windows. This is awesome and it will increase your productivity. I never thought about any other device after purchasing this. Go for it you won't regret.

Exceeded my expectations.I am a stock android fan.its my first purchase for an apple product.hesitated first,but finalize to give it a try.the iOS is more restricted than android.but once you know its limitations,you will adjust with it,as its ecosystem provide full peace of mind.Even with 2GB RAM,the memory management is awosome.And the battery life!!!its a beast.easily last for full 2 days even with heavy use.Great for media consumption.I would highly recommend it to anyone who want a premium build tablet for media consumption and browsing.

It has great speed and everything. Typing out and mailing a document is real easy - that was my primary purpose of buying the iPad, to use it as a lightweight alternative to a laptop, and that purpose has been served. Also works very well with wi-fi, as I had hoped for.

It takes a little while to figure out that a side swipe from the right edge can show me all the apps - at first, I was continuously pressing the home button to go back to the apps menu and feeling irritated about this. The app display management could still have been better, but that's okay - I can live with this.

The reason I can't give the tablet a fifth star is the pathetic sound. There are two speakers but both are at the bottom of the device, and that means, whenever I watch something in landscape mode, the sound comes from one end of the device! Not expected from Apple. Even my tiny Moto e2 phone does better than that - it produces stereo sound in landscape mode, which means Moto's internal sound mechanism is better than Apple. Anything I watch on the iPad will require earphones; whereas, I don't always need earphones to watch a trailer on the Moto e2.

Other than this, I am quite happy with the product.

I ordered the product and got it the very next day. Prompt delivery.

ekart service: excellent
buying experience at flipkart: Excellent, kudos to Flipkart for the great offers on the Big Billion days.
Product: it is an awesome product from Apple. Has the latest IOS 11, It is a delight for first time buyers of apple product. Possessors of Ipad Air may find it a downgrade.

Few words for future buyers:
online buying ain't easy these days, there is always the fear that seller may cheat, the product may not be genuine, the product could be refurbished or defective. First of all, let me tell about the iPad...

Display:
This iPad 2017 comes with a 9.7 inch Retina Display.
Many reviews might have told us that the display is not up to the mark. But, thats not the case actually... The display is just great. No issues whatsoever.

The OS:
The iPad comes with iOS v10.x.x installed. As soon as you check for a software update, you will get your iPad updated to iOS v11.x quickly. And speaking of iOS v11, theres pretty much difference between what you might have seen in iPhones and what you are about to witness in the iPad. There is the dock feature similar to what we might see on the MacOS. And, multitasking layout has been changed. Although there are a ton of improvements, iOS 11 seems a little annoying when it comes to the notifications area. Accidental touches might land you on other apps.

Camera:
The camera quality is great. Typical iPad camera quality can be expected.

Performance:
Offers good performance with occasional lags here and there. Otherwise, it is suitable for multitasking and such as that. We tried a few games and all of them worked well.

Battery Life:
Battery life has been very great as this iPad comes loaded with a massive 8875 MaH battery. Have not charged it yet since the unboxing.

Verdict:
Value for money!

This is my first Apple... never been a fan of mac/ios. Besides, I thought they are overhyped and overpriced. This bargain in the Big Billion days prompted me to finally buy an apple product.

PROs -
Its a good piece of hardware - neat, slim, premium. Impressive display, fairly decent sound quality, finger print sensor works like a charm. Haven't fiddled around with the camera much (too large to go around shooting with). Solid impressed with the battery life. Fantastic wireless connectivity (using my phone's 4G hotspot). No lag whatsoever, A9 doing its best.

CONs -
The principal reason behind staying away from Apple for soooo many years has been the software. Symbian, Windows (mobile), Blackberry, Android - name it, I've used it. Do NOT like iOS / Mac. And all my apprehensions came true. I am an avid user of technology, and like to have the extreme flexibility in the OS, which Android offers (followed by Blackberry, followed by Windows). I am damn cheesed off with the file system of iOS (that too this being iOS 11 we are talking about here).

SUMMARY -
Great entertainment device, but what I actually needed was a portable workstation.
Good tab. UI is lovely what Apple is known for. Good 9+ hours battery backup. But it takes long time to fully charge the battery. 20k by flipkart was a good deal with no cost emi option.

I'll just quickly break down what I have to say in pros & cons:
Pros:
*Super snappy A9 processor, handles everything you throw at it very well
* The screen is brightest I've ever seen on an iPad(including pros)
*The battery is a monster, you really have to work hard to kill it in a day
*Price! It's hard to beat this tablet at this price
*Typical apple high built quality
Cons:
*The display is non laminated and hence the colours are not as vibrant as on a laminated display plus it makes the screen a lot more reflective(You'll not even notice it if you haven't held a device with a laminated display)
*It's a bit thicker than the Air 2 that it replaces (probably because of the extra battery- so I don't mind)
*They have removed the physical mute switch which I liked so much

Conclusion: Hard to beat package at this price
